articles.author: Alaa Elassar, CNN
articles.title: Scientists 3D print microscopic Star Trek spaceship that moves on its own - CNN International
articles.description: A team of physicists at a university in the Netherlands have 3D-printed a microscopic version of the USS Voyager, an Intrepid-class starship from Star Trek.

articles.title: Fur Trades and Pandemics: Coronavirus and Denmark's Great Mink Massacre - International Policy Digest
articles.description: Besides killing hundreds of thousands of people, COVID-19 is to blame for Denmark’s great mink massacre.

articles.title: UA professor: Arizona could reach COVID-19 "crisis point" after Thanksgiving - Arizona Daily Star
